g.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"

text.font-family: "ヒラギノ角ゴ Pro W3", "Hiragino Kaku Gothic Pro", Osaka, "メイリオ", Meiryo, "ＭＳ Ｐゴシック", "MS PGothic"
text.tspan: Tetris Effect is a new take on the modern Tetris
formula, which combines adaptive music with soothing
visuals to create a truly unique, challanging and
relaxing experience. At heart, though, it still
retains Tetris's iconic and addicting puzzle gameplay,
which makes this a perfect game for anyone.
